page.title: 09Questionnaire
page.content: One hundred people who lived in Whitwell were asked a series of questions.The sample was of various ages from 9 years to 60 years,and tended to be relatives or friends of the children at Whitwell Primary School.The following information was gathered; 84% of the sample{enjoyed}living in Whitwell. {Community Life/Village}Life were the main reasons for enjoying Whitwell. {Vandalism,litter,dust,and lack of {pavements}were the main objections. 59% of the sample went to a Hypermarket in{Worksop}to shop. 87% of the sample travelled{less than {5 miles}to work or school. Better{sports facilities,}especially a swimming pool, is what the sample would like to see developed A cinema and more shops were also requested.
